subject: Re: VmWare
body:
So, can someone please point me to a place where I can get info on 
how to get the live cd for ubuntu live cd and how to get it going. I 
did not have any luck on a old box I had here do to gnome not loading 
I think, but, it did indeed load on my vm, just couldn't read it. The 
one I got working was not the live cd I don't think.
Any help would be great.
Thanks.
